overview: "Palmeiras - Champion of the Century" brings memories of the club since its founding in 1914, through the first title, the Campeonato Paulista 1920, until the conquest of Brazil's Cup in 2015. In addition to the moments of glory of the eternal "Champion of the Twentieth Century", the production also recalls the events that further strengthened the "Alviverde Majestic".
title: Palmeiras: O Campeão do Século
